parameters.name: DefaultAddrPool
parameters.description: The address pools in the primary address pool set.

parameters.name: DefaultAddrPoolType
parameters.description:
The type of the primary address pool. Valid values:

*   IPV4
*   IPV6
*   DOMAIN

parameters.name: DefaultLatencyOptimization
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable DNS resolution with optimal latency for the primary address pool set. Valid values:

*   OPEN
*   CLOSE

parameters.name: DefaultLbaStrategy
parameters.description:
The load balancing policy of the primary address pool set. Valid values:

*   ALL_RR: returns all addresses.
*   RATIO: returns addresses by weight.

parameters.name: DefaultMaxReturnAddrNum
parameters.description: The maximum number of addresses returned from the primary address pool set.

parameters.name: DefaultMinAvailableAddrNum
parameters.description: The minimum number of available addresses in the primary address pool set.

parameters.name: FailoverAddrPool
parameters.description: The address pools in the secondary address pool set. If no address pool exists in the secondary address pool set, set this parameter to EMPTY.

parameters.name: FailoverAddrPoolType
parameters.description:
The type of the secondary address pool. Valid values:

*   IPV4
*   IPV6
*   DOMAIN

parameters.name: FailoverLatencyOptimization
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable DNS resolution with optimal latency for the secondary address pool set. Valid values:

*   OPEN
*   CLOSE

parameters.name: FailoverLbaStrategy
parameters.description:
The load balancing policy of the secondary address pool set. Valid values:

*   ALL_RR: returns all addresses.
*   RATIO: returns addresses by weight.

parameters.name: FailoverMaxReturnAddrNum
parameters.description: The maximum number of addresses returned from the secondary address pool set.

parameters.name: FailoverMinAvailableAddrNum
parameters.description: The minimum number of available addresses in the secondary address pool set.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language of the values for specific response parameters. Default value: en. Valid values: en, zh, and ja.

parameters.name: Lines
parameters.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) request source. For example: `["default", "drpeng"]` indicates Global and Dr. Peng Group.

parameters.name: StrategyMode
parameters.description:
The type of the access policy. Valid values:

*   GEO: geographical location-based access policy
*   LATENCY: latency-based access policy

parameters.name: StrategyName
parameters.description: The name of the access policy.
